name: Aquaroom
description:
Sit down, relax, listen and experience the underwater parade.  Try to observe how the things that you see on the screen affect the sounds and music. This is a purely contemplational piece with not much gameplay to it. Enjoy :)

CONTROLS:

- Try interacting with the things on the screen using the POINTER of your MOUSE and a Left Mouse Button!

- Right Mouse Button to change the temperature - more entities will spawn if it's hot

- Middle Mouse Button to produce more entities :-0
